quote: Shift out of supermodel mode and into teacher mode. Focus on your message, not how you look.
why_clipworthy: This advice helps agents overcome a common barrier to using video effectively.
suggested_hook: Feeling self-conscious on camera? Here's how to shift your mindset.

quote: Jessica closed $5 million in sales this year from video, by showing her real self and expertise.
why_clipworthy: A powerful success story that illustrates the potential impact of video marketing.
suggested_hook: Want to know how video can transform your real estate business?
